评论概述: Great for yoga or a casual day
评论详情: This shirt is comfy and stylish.

True to size. I ordered medium and wear a 10-12. It’s long enough for yoga class and the larger arm holes make movement easy but aren’t so large to show my bra. Material is soft and the design is pretty.
Very comfortable and lightweight. Love the colors and design choices. Bought a second one in blue with a different design.
Great image design, soft shirt
I always get compliments on the design.
Perfect for someone with a long torso that appreciates some modesty when wearing yoga pants.
I buy these to wear to the gym.  They are perfect for that.
I’m pleased with the softness of this shirt. It will be a gift.
I’m happy with this shirt. The fabric is soft and a little stretchy. The design on the shirt is placed well and doesn’t seem like it’s going to come off easily like some other tees.
Fabric is soft and comfortable. Colors look like in pictures. True to size. Relaxed fit but not baggy looking.
Nice, lightweight with subtle colors. Fits true to size.
One of my fave go to tshirts. Fit is as expected and comfy!! The design is pretty.

This t-shirt was so much nicer than expected! I bought the navy shirt with the multi-colored lotus. The color is a rich blue. Love it! Also, the fabric is a nice, heavy material; not thin and see- through. I am 5'3" and weigh 170lbs. A large size fit perfectly. I will definitely buy another shirt!
Received as pictured and described. I love the color and Lotus motif. Will update after laundering if needed. I definitely have another favorite shirt.
Nice shirt, good fabric quality design Seems pretty decent. I’m satisfied. Its light weight thin and loose fit

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ **Great Shirt for Yoga and Casual Wear**  I love my new Lotus Flower T-shirt! The vintage mandala design is beautiful and the fabric is soft and comfortable. It's perfect for yoga, meditation, or just casual wear. The fit is just right, and the short sleeves are great for summer. I highly recommend this shirt for anyone looking for a stylish and comfy addition to their wardrobe.
Such a waste of money! What a scam. Don’t buy. It doesn’t hold up in the washer!
Just a happy everyday t-shirt
Cute. Comfy. Nice material. Fits normal. No decal issues thus far.
I wear this shirt to bed some nights. It’s a great shirt: soft and comfortable.  It is currently one of my favorites. It fits as expected for the size, and the color is beautiful.
The design is not centered on the shirt

评论概述: Nice but fabric a little thin
评论详情: Pretty design, colors as pictured. I found it to run a little small, maybe half a size. Soft comfortable fabric but thinner than I expected.
Nice soft fabric! The mandala is beautiful. I didn't realize the shirt was heather green, not true green, but it's OK. True to size and long enough.
I got some of these picture novelty shirts, and I love them. They are light they fit nice, they are non-clingy, and can match a lot of things.
Nice design but it's a tighter fit. Really bu.med out that it doesn't stretch much. Wouldn't buy again

Surprises like this shirt are welcome in the realm of online shopping. I love the Mandalay burst and the color green is oh so lovely. cotton blend that is softer than flannel. thx! I am kinda round, 5'2" and 152# i got the xl bc i love roomy.
Great T-shirt for the money
Vibrant color, soft material. I’m very happy with this shirt.
Such a cute top with vibrant colors! It’s a soft, stretchy fabric with a loose fit, which I love! Very happy with this purchase so far and would recommend to others!
I just love the colors in this shirt.  It is generous in size, so I wouldn't order up. The t-shirt is so soft & I don't think it will shrink. I now have 4 of them!

I purchased this shirt specifically for my daughter, and I must say that it fit her perfectly. The material of the T-shirt is truly fantastic, offering a pleasant and comfortable feel. The medallion picture on the front is not only visually appealing, but it also exhibits excellent craftsmanship. The shirt itself is of high quality, and I highly recommend it to others. Furthermore, it fits true to size, ensuring a great fit. I hope this information proves helpful. 😊
